capacity-alerts-tooltip: Total number of managed elements with capacity alerts.
dp-alerts-tooltip: Total number of volumes and servers with data protection alerts
jobs-alerts-tooltip: Total number of failed job alerts in the last 24 hours.
hardware-alerts-tooltip: Total number of hardware resources with alerts.
file-used-capacity-tooltip: {{fileUsedCapacity}} File Pool Used - Total used capacity of all file pools.
used-capacity-tooltip: {{usedCapacity}} Thin Used - Total used physical capacity of all volumes.
free-capacity-tooltip: {{freeCapacity}} Thin Free - Total available physical capacity across all storage pools.
volumes-used-capacity-tooltip: {{usedCapacity}} Used - Total used capacity of all volumes.
volumes-free-capacity-tooltip: {{freeCapacity}} Free - Total available capacity of all volumes.
allocated-capacity-tooltip: {{allocatedCapacity}} Allocated to Pools - Total capacity of all storage pools.
unallocated-capacity-tooltip: {{unallocatedCapacity}} Unallocated to Pools - Unused parity group capacity.
subscription-capacity-tooltip: {{subscribedCapacity}} Subscribed Capacity - Total subscribed capacity of all volumes.
protected-capacity-tooltip: {{protectedCapacity}} Protected - Total capacity of all volumes that are protected.
unprotected-capacity-tooltip: {{unprotectedCapacity}} Unprotected - Total capacity of all volumes that are not protected.
secondary-capacity-tooltip: {{secondaryCapacity}} Secondary - Total capacity of all secondary volumes.
overcommit-capacity-tooltip: {{overcommitCapacity}} File Overcommit Capacity - Total overcommit capacity of all file pools.
physical-capacity-tooltip: {{physicalCapacity}} Physical Capacity - Total usable capacity across all parity groups.
common-label-file-physical-capacity: Ph. Cap. alloc for File Pools
file-physical-capacity-tooltip: {{filePhysicalCapacity}} Physical Capacity - Total physical capacity allocated to file pools.

discover-external-storages-selected-cont: This request will scan the port to find all available external storage systems, Thus, it may take some time. Do you want to proceed?

storage-pools-active-flash-license-info: Platinum tier parity group and valid license is needed to enable Active Flash for Pool.
storage-pool-suspend-snapshot-descriptio: If this threshold is exceeded, snapshots will be disabled to ensure there is enough capacity for user data.

storage-pool-dedup-comp-not-configured: Compression and Deduplication are not configured
storage-volumes-add-unmatched-compress-t: The volume to be created can be compressed by FMD drives. In order to prevent the I/O performance degradation, make sure the following conditions are satisfied before creating the volume.
Enable FMD Compression for all FMD drives in target Pool
Select 'No' for 'Capacity Saving' for Volume in this wizard

select-port-wwn-tooltip: Optional inputs - Select the storage port and Server WWN to be used for create one or more path between the Server and Storage system. If not selected, Hitachi Storage Advisor will auto select the best port and WWN to be used
lun-alignment-tooltip: Select Yes if you want the volume to be attached to all servers using same LUN ID
auto-create-zone-tooltip: Select Yes if you want to create zones between the Storage port and Server WWNs

storage-system-invalid-username: Enter alphanumeric characters or symbols (- . @ _) within 63 characters. If you have already setup username using other character with HDvM-SN, please modify.

common-error-message: Check input and try again. Otherwise, navigate to the Jobs page and view job status - the operation may be taking longer than expected.

navigator-session-html-error: Storage Navigator is not accessible. Please close this page and verify network connectivity and credentials used to onboard Storage System.

full-copy-tooltip: Full Copy - Makes a continuous copy of the volumes selected using Shadow Image technology

add-host-tool-tip: Use this to bulk import server information from an excel sheet
host-update-fibre-confirmation-content: Performing this action will edit existing host groups on the storage array to reflect changes to the server details. If there are zones on the fabric switches that were created automatically by HSA, these zones will also be updated (manually created zones will not be affected). Are you sure you want to proceed?

host-update-chap-confirm-overwrite-chap-: All of the CHAP users related to this server will be overwritten by the specified CHAP secret. Are you sure you want to proceed?

invalid-protect-volume-copy-group-messag: Enter up to 26 alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores in the name, but it must not start with a hyphen.
invalid-volume-label: Revise the label input. Following characters are valid: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, '_', '.', '@', '-' and ' '. The maximum length of label and suffix is 32. The label must not start with '-' or ' ' and must not end with ' '.

no-available-replication-group: Selected volume is in an external replication group or not in any HSA replication groups.
replication-groups-hourly-note: Snap will start every {{schedule.hourInterval || hourInterval}} hours on the {{minuteDisplay}} minute of the UTC time. Current time in UTC is {{currentDate | date:'MM/dd/yy hh:mm a' : 'UTC'}}.
replication-groups-hourly-note-zero: Snap will start every {{schedule.hourInterval || hourInterval}} hours of the UTC time. Current time in UTC is {{currentDate | date:'MM/dd/yy hh:mm a' : 'UTC'}}.
replication-groups-daily-note: Snap will start every day of the UTC time. Current time in UTC is {{currentDate | date:'MM/dd/yy hh:mm a' : 'UTC'}}.
replication-groups-weekly-note: Snap will start every week of the UTC time. Current time in UTC is {{currentDate | date:'MM/dd/yy hh:mm a' : 'UTC'}}.
replication-groups-monthly-note: Snap will start every month of the UTC time. Current time in UTC is {{currentDate | date:'MM/dd/yy hh:mm a' : 'UTC'}}.
replication-group-edit-remove-pvol-messa: Select the Primary volumes to remove
replication-group-remove-secondary-volum: The volume will be removed from selected Replication Groups and the volume pairs will be deleted.
replication-group-actions-confirmation-m: The following volume pairs and other volume pairs in same consistency group will be affected. Do you want to continue?
replication-group-actions-suspend-snapsh: The selected replication group will be suspended. No volume pairs will be affected. Do you want to continue?
replication-group-actions-resume-snapsho: The selected replication group will be resumed. No volume pairs will be affected. Do you want to continue?
replication-group-actions-delete-snapsho: The selected replication group will be deleted. No volume pairs will be affected. Do you want to continue?
replication-group-actions-restore-confir: The selected primary volumes will be restored by using corresponding secondary volumes. Do you want to continue?
replication-group-description-for-target: Note: For volumes that already contain one or more snapshots, new snapshots will be saved in the same pool as the existing snapshots.
replication-group-can-not-create-multipl: A replication group cannot be created. For pairs (other than 'Clone') in the selected volumes {{volumeIDs}}, confirm that all pairs were replicated by using 'SNAP' or 'SNAP on SNAP'.
restore-confirmation-message: Select from the following secondary volumes to restore current primary volume:
snap-on-snap-tooltip: Snap on Snap  Snapshot with cascade capability
snap-clone-tooltip: Snap Clone  Full copy of snapshot
shred-volumes-basic-panel-description: Shred all specified volumes with the following pattern:
shred-volumes-invalid-pattern-message: Enter a hexadecimal value of up to 8 digits.
interrupt-shredding-confirmation-message: All shredding operations that are currently running on the storage system will be interrupted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
migrate-volumes-poor-capacity-confirmati: After migration, the total used capacity in the target pool will exceed utilization threshold 2. Do you want to proceed?
migrate-volumes-not-normal-confirmation-: The migration task might fail, because the status of the target pool is {{status}}. Are you sure you want to proceed?
migrate-volumes-tooltip-migrate-now: Migrate Now - Execute the migration immediately
migrate-volumes-tooltip-migrate-later: Migrate Later - Schedules the migration task at specified time.

migrate-volumes-invalid-date-message: Enter date with valid date format.
migration-task-interrupt-selected-conten: The jobs for selected {{getSelectedCount()}} Migration Tasks will be interrupted. Do you want to proceed?
migration-task-delete-selected-content: The selected {{getSelectedCount()}} Migration Tasks will be deleted. Do you want to proceed?
attach-to-storage-no-ports-message: The port of the selected protocol does not exist on the target storage system. Select a different target storage system or a different protocol.
fail-to-discover-error: There is no volume discovered on the selected port. Please check your physical connection.
job-failed-error: Create Path From Source Job failed. Please go to Job page to check the reason.
external-volume-unvirtualize-content: The current external volume will be unvirtualized. Do you want to proceed?
external-volumes-unvirtualize-content: The selected {{getSelectedCount()}} external volumes in the current storage system will be unvirtualized. This action will detach and delete external volume and delete the underlying external parity group. Do you want to proceed?
